title: My Portfolio (2017)
description: My new homepage to demonstrate my Front-End development skill to people. The site is built with Vuejs and focus on responsive design and the ease to add new project sections.
achievements: Used Vue.js to construct the website for cleaner code base
Utilized Responsive Design in Semantic UI
Plugged in lazy load images feature in Semantic UI
Generated site data from JSON files, the website can be updated without changing HTML or javascript
Used webpack for development and final assets deployment
